properties.state_description: This screen allows users to perform various maintenance tasks to optimize their Mac's performance. Users can select tasks like freeing up RAM, purging space, flushing DNS cache, speeding up mail, reindexing Spotlight, repairing disk permissions, and thinning Time Machine snapshots.
